segments.text: Yes . It's really wonderful here The grass is greener and the air is fresher than those in the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Let's go out and enjoy the beautiful natural scenery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , what a beautiful lake ! The green hills and clear water really provide magnificent scenery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: En , it's so beautiful that I don't want to move my eyes from it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel as if I'm living in a different world , honey .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The same to me . All the things here make me happy , the mountain , the water , the grass , the birds , the sunshine ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we should go out more frequently . The natural scenery can do us good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the point . We should walk into the nature and enjoy its beauty whenever we have time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . The city life has made us tired and out of energy , while the natural world can bring us quite new feelings .
segments.speaker: S1
